headline.main: The Right to Smoke Vs. the Right to Breathe

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Alice Schultze complains in her recent article [ 'An Office Casualty: My Right to Smoke,'' Opinion Page ] that ''No smoking in the workplace is the latest form of discrimination.''
docs.snippet: LEAD: Alice Schultze complains in her recent article  [ 'An Office Casualty: My Right to Smoke,'' Opinion Page ]  that ''No smoking in the workplace is the latest form of discrimination.''
